questions.question: How comfortable and heard did you feel during your interaction with the officers?
How long did you wait to be seen by an officer after arriving at the station?
How would you rate the officer's professionalism and respect during your interaction?
How clearly and effectively did the officer explain the procedure for reporting your issue?
If applicable, were you kept informed about any updates or progress related to your issue?
During your interaction, did you feel you had enough opportunity to voice your concerns?
Overall, how satisfied were you with the experience you had at the police station today?
